metadata.title: Sometimes

xml.lyrics:
Sometime I feel like cryin', but the tears won't come down
Sometime I feel like cryin', but the tears won't come down
All because I want my loved one, but she's nowhere around
Sometime I think I gonna leave, then again I wanna stay
Oh-oh, think I wanna leave, then again I wanna stay
Yes my thought's so mixed up, ever since she went away
Sometime I hope and I pray, that she'll return someday
Oh-oh, hope and I pray, that she'll return someday
But I'm so all alone, I know I can't last this way
Sometime I feel like cryin', but the tears won't come down
Oh yeah, feel like cryin' , but the tears won't come down
All because I want my loved one and she's nowhere around
